title: Southern Charm: Eighth Time's The Charm
description: Season eight of Southern Charm premiered this week, and there's already so much drama out of the gate: did Naomie and Craig DO IT? Will Kathryn and Naomie mend fences? And what will happen to Shep and Craig? Looks like a fine mess to us!
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
